events.description: The ECB kept its interest rate unchanged at 2%.

facts.fact_text: Frankfurt's DAX 40 closed about 0.5% down at 24,491 on Thursday.

evidences.evidence_text: Frankfurt's DAX 40 pared back losses to close about 0.5% down at 24,491 on Thursday

facts.fact_text: The ECB kept its interest rate unchanged at 2%, the level it has remained at since June.

evidences.evidence_text: The ECB kept its interest rate unchanged at 2%, the level it has remained at since June, as widely expected.

claims.claim_text: Investor sentiment soured amid concerns about overvalued markets, massive AI investments, and worrying US employment numbers.

evidences.evidence_text: Investor sentiment soured amid concerns about overvalued markets, massive AI investments, and worrying US employment numbers.

claims.claim_text: The eurozone economy remains resilient and inflation risks are “overall balanced,” even as trade and geopolitical uncertainties persist.
claims.author: ECB

evidences.evidence_text: The central bank emphasized that the eurozone economy remains resilient and inflation risks are “overall balanced,” even as trade and geopolitical uncertainties persist.

evidence.evidence_text: The ECB kept its interest rate unchanged at 2%, the level it has remained at since June, as widely expected.
